body_html: Of course I understand that this is a quite limited extension that we can do. But if the overhead for this extension is negligible, maybe it is worth it? Otherwise there are always DIY ways to tackle this to one's need. I just wish to discuss about this possibility. I fully understand that it might not worth it to get the code bloated for this edge case. If this is your decision, feel free to say so and close this issue :)
